issue.title: [Python] Provide wrappers for ConcatenateWithPromotion()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7227](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7227). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5534> Introduced ConcatenateWithPromotion() to C++. Provide a Python wrapper for it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7227?focusedCommentId=16992624) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
